ai-patthana10.6:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana10.6:0.3_0: he has laid down, and stands on the perception of the skillful.
ai-patthana10.6:2.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
ai-patthana10.6:3.1_4: not for the sake of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.6:4.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
